query.name: ProbeSet_FlyAtlas
query.view: ProbeSet.primaryIdentifier ProbeSet.results.presentCall ProbeSet.results.enrichment ProbeSet.results.affyCall ProbeSet.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.tissue.name
query.longDescription: Show the expression data of the following probeset in the FlyAtlas experiments. (Data Source: Affymetrix, FlyAtlas).
